# lyne-input-error



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `message`   | `message`    | The error message, we want to show.                                                                      | `string` | `undefined` |
| `messageId` | `message-id` | Each error message needs a unique id which will be passed on from another module (e.g. lyne-text-input). | `string` | `undefined` |
